title: Flickr image URLs
description: Fetch image URLs for different sizes (requires an API key)
type_desc: Lookup nodes can fetch data from metapipe collections or from external APIs.

scripts.url: var base_url = 'https://api.flickr.com/services/rest/?method=flickr.photos.getSizes'; var format = '&format=json&nojsoncallback=?';out.url = base_url + '&photo_id=' + context.doc[context.node.params.field] + format + '&api_key=' + context.node.params.apikey

views.data_static: [count] id title description link
views.params: <label>Flickr API key </label><input type="text" name="apikey" id="apikey" required /><input type="hidden" name="field" id="field" value='id'/><input type="hidden" name="suffix" id="suffix" value='_photo_sizes'/>
